As @{557058:90bc87b0-2886-4377-a17c-3a6629a697ff} mentioned on the pull request, the option should only disable threading for rendering sensors, within the sensors system. Post-update threading is not affecting determinism.

For more historic context, synchronization between sensors and physics is an [old issue](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2502/make-sure-cameras-fps-is-strictly-applied/diff) on Gazebo classic.
